121331311133121122221131233331.content:
“Explain, now!” Yang said, locking the bathroom door so they weren’t disturbed.

“My boobies can hypnotize people…” Ruby droned, still under Yang’s command.

“How long have you known?” Yang asked, calming down slightly.

“Years.”

“YEARS!?” Yang slammed ah and on her mouth. “Have you used it a lot…”

“Yes.” Ruby admitted.

“On who?”

“You.”

Yang’s eyes widened and she couldn’t believe it.

“Tell me what you did.” Yang demanded.

“It started off small,” Ruby said. “I would have you give me extra cookies, make my favorite meals, let me choose the TV channel, those kind of things.”

“Okay…” Yang remembered those stuff happened, but she always assumed it was just being a big sister.

“Then I realized I could prank you.” Ruby continued.

“Prank?”

“I would make you lose things or forget where stuff was if you teased me,” Ruby explained. “Once I made you sleep in Zwei’s bed because you spilt soda on mine and I used yours.”

“How many bad things did you do to me?” Yang asked dryly.

“I just considered them harmless pranks mostly…,” Ruby admitted. “Though it was 3 years ago when I realized I could get revenge. I was in the shower and you deliberately came in and flushed the toilet a couple times.” Yang did remember doing that occasionally because Ruby was taking too long or Yang was bored. “So I made you use the bathroom outside with Zwei for a week.”

Yang’s eyes widened. Now that Ruby mentioned that, she did remember that back in middle school. She had thought it was rebelling against the system, though her dad almost caught her once and she stopped. Ruby must have let her back in the house then.

“I made you break up with Lorenzo too,” Ruby muttered weakly. “I thought he was taking all of your time and you were forgetting about me.”

Yang’s mouth fell open. Lorenzo was a really nice guy back then who she liked. But at some point, she decided he wasn’t for her and broke up. She couldn’t remember why.

“The worst thing though made me stop using my powers.” Ruby continued.

“The worst thing?” Yang asked.

“I found out you and dad wouldn’t let me go to a sleepover because there were boys there,” Ruby explained. “You two originally told me something else was going on, but I hypnotized you to tell me the truth. You were just babying me and I was upset. I yelled at you two to f each other. The first and last time I ever used a swear.”

Yang began to sweat drop.

“Dad had sex with you on the kitchen table for over an hour.”

Yang felt her brain freeze at this confession. She didn’t remember this at all, but she did remember the first time, or what she thought was the first time, she had sex. Her hymen had been broken, but she assumed that was due to training.

“I promised to never swear again or use my powers.” Ruby finished.

“You….” Yang’s eyes flashed red. Ruby had bene abusing her with powers for years without her knowing. She found out her power but rarely used it until yesterday.

She had done a lot to Yang over the years, mostly harmless, until she lost her cool. Since then, she never cussed. Now Yang had hypno tits and was using them. Did she make Blake be her girlfriend? Ruby smiled and then went back to her thoughts as Weiss and Blake sat down. There were only two commands left in Yang she remembered.

The first was ‘New Bathroom Location’ followed by a location. This command would have Yang reason to herself to use anywhere as a bathroom as long as she didn’t get caught. The second command was “Cookie Creation Mode.’ This would make Yang want to make cookies. She actually learned to suppress this command for days, but would eventually make cookies.

Neither would help Ruby right now.

“I need your attention!” Glynda told everyone. “Mrs. Xiao-Long has been assigned to give you all your assignment since she believes she can do it so much better.” Her tone said this was a punishment and anyone caught slacking would get punished. Everyone turned to look at Yang.

Ruby realized where this was going as Yang pulled her top down.
